```{r}
thresholds <- numeric(10)

for (i in 1:10) {
  thresholds[i] <- quantile(sales_10_adj[,i], 0.9)
}


models <- list()

for (i in 1:10) {
  models[[i]] <- evd::fpot(sales_10_adj[,i], thresholds[i])
}

unif_transformed <- sapply(1:10, function (i) {
  data <-
    dgpd(
      sales_10_adj[, i],
      loc = thresholds[i],
      scale = models[[i]]$estimate[1],
      shape = models[[i]]$estimate[2]
    )
})
```
